00046 // DataCommonNeuron definition
00047 // common for all neurons
00048 // contains a pointer list to the link to the presynapses, and a pointer list to the postsynapses
00050 
00051 class DataCommonNeuron
00052 {
00053     friend class DataCommonNeuronVisitor;
00054 
00055 // construction
00056 protected:
00057     explicit DataCommonNeuron(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00058     void add_presynapse_impl(SynapseInterface * const syn);
00059     void add_postsynapse_impl(SynapseInterface * const syn);
00060     void apply_vis_impl(AbstractVisitor & vis);
00061 
00062 // update methods
00063 protected:
00064     void notify_firing_impl(const Time & time_to_spike);
00065     inline void plast_update_impl() {}
00066 
00067 // members and accessors
00068 protected:
00069     typedef std::list<boost::shared_ptr<SynMechInterface> > ListSynMechType;
00070     typedef std::list<boost::shared_ptr<SynapseInterface> > ListPostSynType;
00071     const ListSynMechType & presynmechlist_impl() const {
00072         return presyn_mech_list_;
00073     };
00074     const ListPostSynType & list_postsynapses_impl() const {
00075         return list_postsynapses_;
00076     } // list of postsynapses
00077 private:
00078     ListSynMechType presyn_mech_list_; // list of presynaptic mechanisms
00079     ListPostSynType list_postsynapses_; // list of postsynapses
00080 };
00081 
00082 
00083 
00085 // DataCommonNeuronVisitor class definition
00087 
00088 class DataCommonNeuronVisitor
00089         : public AbstractVisitor
00090         , public Visitor<DataCommonNeuron>
00091 {
00092 public:
00093     typedef DataCommonNeuron::ListPostSynType ListPostSynType;
00094     DataCommonNeuronVisitor() : postsyn_list_pointer_(0) {}
00095     void reset() {
00096         postsyn_list_pointer_ = 0;
00097     }
00098     void visit(DataCommonNeuron & dcn) {
00099         postsyn_list_pointer_ = & dcn.list_postsynapses_;
00100     }
00101     ListPostSynType * const postsyn_list_pointer() const {
00102         return postsyn_list_pointer_;
00103     }
00104 protected:
00105     ListPostSynType * postsyn_list_pointer_;
00106 };

00111 // inline definitions
00113 
00115 // constructor
00116 inline DataCommonNeuron::DataCommonNeuron(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00117 {
00118     if (! dynamic_cast<DataCommonNeuronConfig *>(configurator))
00119         throw ConfigError("DataCommonNeuron: void configurator");
00120 };
00121 
00123 // add a preneuron to the list
00124 inline void DataCommonNeuron::add_presynapse_impl(SynapseInterface * const syn)
00125 {
00126     // add the synaptic mechanism if it is not already in the list (no duplicate)
00127     bool found = false;
00128     for (ListSynMechType::const_iterator i = presyn_mech_list_.begin(); i != presyn_mech_list_.end(); ++i)
00129         if (syn->syn_mech() == (*i).operator->()) {
00130             found = true;
00131             break;
00132         }
00133     if (! found)
00134         presyn_mech_list_.push_back(boost::shared_ptr<SynMechInterface>(syn->syn_mech()));
00135 }
00136 
00138 // add a postneuron to the list
00139 inline void DataCommonNeuron::add_postsynapse_impl(SynapseInterface * const syn)
00140 {
00141     list_postsynapses_.push_back(boost::shared_ptr<SynapseInterface>(syn));
00142 }
00143 
00145 // called when the neuron fires a spike (activation mechanism)
00146 inline void DataCommonNeuron::notify_firing_impl(const Time & time_to_spike)
00147 {
00148 //TODO add parallel send or
00149     // notify the post synapses
00150     for (ListPostSynType::const_iterator i = list_postsynapses_.begin();
00151             i != list_postsynapses_.end();
00152             ++i)
00153         (*i)->on_preneuron_fire_update(time_to_spike);
00154 }
00155 
00157 // to access the list of postsynapses
00158 inline void DataCommonNeuron::apply_vis_impl(AbstractVisitor & vis)
00159 {
00160     // check the compatibilty of the visitor and call the method visit if suitable
00161     DataCommonNeuronVisitor * ptvis = dynamic_cast<DataCommonNeuronVisitor *>(& vis);
00162     if (ptvis)
00163         ptvis->visit(*this);
00164 }
